title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. XX, pt. 941 - Adjudicatory Proceedings and Appeals Procedure
content:

§ 941.4 - Time and place of hearing and service of filings

§ 941.14 - Fines, penalties
§ 941.15 - Record of hearing
§ 941.16 - Privacy/confidentiality

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. XX, pt. 941

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §94; State

Administrative Procedure Act, §§ 301, et seq

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
